snippet: If President Obama can get a good turnout from his base, he'll be the heavy favorite to win in November - even if Mitt Romney gets a strong turnout as well.
abstract: If President Obama can get a good turnout from his base, he'll be the heavy favorite to win in November - even if Mitt Romney gets a strong turnout as well.

headline.main: Obama Would Be Big Favorite With 'Fired Up' Base
